New Records: Nikola Jokic and Russell Westbrook notched triple-doubles in the victory
Key Match Events: Watson took only five shot attempts, but he made solid contributions in secondary categories in the victory
The combination of Nikola Jokic and Russell Westbrook overpowered the Nets
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets are glad to have Jokic back at full strength after his recent illness
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jokic ranks third in the NBA with 145 career triple-doubles
Westbrook is the NBA's all-time leader in triple-doubles
Others: Jamal Murray (knee) likely helped Westbrook reach the milestone
Aaron Gordon's (calf) extended absence has placed Westbrook center stage
